title: Point of Maximum Stress
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053919/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053919/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Point of Maximum Stress**

The thickest part of curved letters, like **C** , **O** , **S** , etc. (The term [stress](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053919/http:/typophile.com/wiki/stress) in typography generally indicates emphasis, not pressure.)
author: paul d hunt
